snippet: The decline was yet another disappointing public debut in a year that has been tough for initial public offerings.
abstract: DealBook Online; Pure Storage shares fall bellow initial public offering price on first day of trading, leaving company with valuation of under $3 billion, which is lower than value following last private-funding round.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The decline was yet another disappointing public debut in a year that has been tough for initial public offerings.

headline.main: Pure Storage Slumps in First Day of Trading
